verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> showed <S%G5319><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea <S%G2281><s%> of Tiberias; <S%G5085><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> on this wise <S%G3779><s%> showed <S%G5319><s%> he himself.

There were <S%G2258><s%> together <S%G3674><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Cana <S%G2580><s%> in Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sons of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> other <S%G243><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> I go <S%G5217><s%> a fishing. <S%G232><s%> They say <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> thee. <S%G4671><s%> They went forth, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%> immediately: <S%G2117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> they caught <S%G4084><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when the morning <S%G4405><s%> was now <S%G2235><s%> come, <S%G1096><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> shore: <S%G123><s%> but <S%G3305><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Children, <S%G3813><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> ye any <S%G3387><s%> meat? <S%G4371><s%> They answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> No. <S%G3756><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> net <S%G1350><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> side <S%G3313><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> ship, <S%G4143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall find. <S%G2147><s%> They cast <S%G906><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G2089><s%> they were not able <S%G2480><s%> <S%G3756><s%> to draw <S%G1670><s%> it <S%G846><s%> for <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of fishes. <S%G2486><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto Peter, <S%G4074><s%> It is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Now <S%G3767><s%> when Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> he girt <S%G1241><s%> his fisher's coat <S%G1903><s%> unto him, (for <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> naked,) <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> did cast <S%G906><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other <S%G243><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> in a little ship; <S%G4142><s%> (for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> far <S%G3112><s%> from <S%G575><s%> land, <S%G1093><s%> but <S%G235><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> two <S%G575><s%> hundred <S%G1250><s%> cubits,) <S%G4083><s%> dragging <S%G4951><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> net <S%G1350><s%> with fishes. <S%G2486><s%>

As soon then as <S%G5613><s%> <S%G3767><s%> they were come <S%G576><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> land, <S%G1093><s%> they saw <S%G991><s%> a fire of coals <S%G439><s%> there, <S%G2749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fish <S%G3795><s%> laid thereon, <S%G1945><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Bring <S%G5342><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fish <S%G3795><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye have now <S%G3568><s%> caught. <S%G4084><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> went up, <S%G305><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drew <S%G1670><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> net <S%G1350><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> land <S%G1093><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of great <S%G3173><s%> fishes, <S%G2486><s%> a hundred and fifty and three: <S%G1540><s%> <S%G4004><s%> <S%G5140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for all there were <S%G5607><s%> so many, <S%G5118><s%> yet was not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> net <S%G1350><s%> broken. <S%G4977><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> and dine. <S%G709><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> durst <S%G5111><s%> ask <S%G1833><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> thou? <S%G4771><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> cometh, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> taketh <S%G2983><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> giveth <S%G1325><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fish <S%G3795><s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> is now <S%G2235><s%> the third time <S%G5154><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> showed <S%G5319><s%> himself to his <S%G848><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> after that he was risen <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they had dined, <S%G709><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> to Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of Jona, <S%G2495><s%> lovest <S%G25><s%> thou me <S%G3165><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> than these? He <S%G5130><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G5368><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%> He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Feed <S%G1006><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> lambs. <S%G721><s%>

He saith <S%G3004><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> the second time, <S%G1208><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of Jona, <S%G2495><s%> lovest <S%G25><s%> thou me? He <S%G3165><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G5368><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%> He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Feed <S%G4165><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> third time, <S%G5154><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of Jona, <S%G2495><s%> lovest <S%G5368><s%> thou me? <S%G3165><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was grieved <S%G3076><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> third time, <S%G5154><s%> Lovest <S%G5368><s%> thou me? <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1097><s%> all things; <S%G3956><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G5368><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Feed <S%G1006><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

Verily, <S%G281><s%> verily, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> thou wast <S%G2258><s%> young, <S%G3501><s%> thou girdedst <S%G2224><s%> thyself, <S%G4572><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walkedst <S%G4043><s%> whither <S%G3699><s%> thou wouldest: <S%G2309><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> thou shalt be old, <S%G1095><s%> thou shalt stretch forth <S%G1614><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> hands, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> shall gird <S%G2224><s%> thee, <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> carry <S%G5342><s%> thee whither <S%G3699><s%> thou wouldest <S%G2309><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> spake <S%G2036><s%> he, signifying <S%G4591><s%> by what <S%G4169><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> he should glorify <S%G1392><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> when he had spoken <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> turning about, <S%G1994><s%> seeth <S%G991><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> following; <S%G190><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> leaned <S%G377><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> breast <S%G4738><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> supper, <S%G1173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he that betrayeth <S%G3860><s%> thee? <S%G4571><s%>
Peter <S%G4074><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G5126><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall this man <S%G3778><s%> do?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> tarry <S%G3306><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is that to <S%G4314><s%> thee? <S%G4571><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> went this saying abroad <S%G1831><s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3056><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> should not <S%G3756><s%> die: <S%G599><s%> yet <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> He shall <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> die; <S%G599><s%> but, <S%G235><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> tarry <S%G3306><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is that to <S%G4314><s%> thee? <S%G4571><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> which testifieth <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> these things: <S%G5023><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true. <S%G227><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there are <S%G2076><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other things <S%G243><s%> which <S%G3745><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> the which, <S%G3748><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they should be written <S%G1125><s%> every one, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> I suppose <S%G3633><s%> that even the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> could not <S%G3761><s%> contain <S%G5562><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> books <S%G975><s%> that should be written. <S%G1125><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
